definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to walk (side part of split character)
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of

sentences.english: Two cases of cholera, one of which has ended fatally, have occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏發生過兩起霍亂病例，其中一人已經死亡。

sentences.english: The cap passes close word, can accelerate the rate of trichomadesis.
sentences.chinese: 帽子過緊的話，會加快脫髮的速度。

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 張靚穎在超級女聲的比賽中表演過這首歌。

sentences.english: In three more my sister would want to go.
sentences.chinese: 再過三年，妹妹也要上了。

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的獨行者過每天。

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，我曾幫助過一位納粹集中營倖存者。

sentences.english: At no time, though, did Reagan ever criticize the United Nations specifically.
sentences.chinese: 但里根從未對聯合國提出過明確的批評。

sentences.english: After lunch my father dozes in his chair.
sentences.chinese: 喫過午飯後我父親總在他的椅子上打個盹。

sentences.english: It is a jiffy after three.
Dreyman: I specifically said no books.
sentences.chinese: 特定的我提醒過不要書。

sentences.english: Sampras run forward to hit an overhead shot.
sentences.chinese: 桑普拉斯跑向前打了一個過頭球。

sentences.english: See, I stopped at the red traffic light, and I swear it never turned green!
sentences.chinese: 紅燈亮了，我踩了腳剎車，誰知道那燈再沒變綠過。

sentences.english: But, she's never achieved chart success with her music.
sentences.chinese: 但是她的音樂從沒有成功的進入過排行榜。

sentences.english: They did it, I’ve done it, and so can you.
sentences.chinese: 他們做到了，我也曾嘗試過，你也可以做到的。

sentences.english: But Ryan Reser of the U.S. judo team has never been to the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 但是這位美國柔道選手以前從來沒有參加過奧運比賽。

sentences.english: No longer would his darling’s candle be extinguished by his useless tears.
sentences.chinese: 寶貝女兒的蠟燭再也沒有被他無用的眼淚熄滅過。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
